vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βερνίκη (elsewhere Βερενίκη), Macedonian form of Φερενίκη, cf. Veronica, Victoria), -ης, ἡ,
Bernice, Berenice, dau. of Herod Agrippa I: Act.25:13, 23 26:3o.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.25.13
§ Bernice, "victorious"
Bernice, (Proper name), Acts 25:13, 23; 26:30*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
百尼基 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "帶來勝利"
分封王希律的大女兒 (徒 25:13,23, 26:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
百尼基 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "带来胜利"
分封王希律的大女儿 (徒 25:13,23, 26:30)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Bê-rê-nít, «chiến thắng» con gái của vua Hê-rốt Ac-ríp-ba I.
